snippet: The death of a Utah soccer referee a week after he was punched by a player raised questions about the seeming rise in severity of assaults on officials.
abstract: Death of Utah soccer referee Ricardo Portillo, who died as a result of being punched in the face by a player, raises questions about the seeming rise in severity of assaults on officials.
lead_paragraph: The death of a Utah soccer referee a week after he was punched by a player raised questions about the seeming rise in severity of assaults on officials.

headline.main: A Whistle, a Punch, and a Soccer Referee Is Dead
